originalText.text:
You would never go wrong with Natalie and Ogen when it comes to defending your rights.
As soon as they accept your case, they fight for your rights as they are fighting for their own rights.
I believe there is no other attornies in City better than Natalie and Ogen.
God bless both of them and I wish them the best!!!

originalText.text: Earlier this year I was sitting in my car about to park when I was suddenly struck from behind by a distracted driver. And to make matters worse, after failing to provide his insurance information he fled the scene! A close friend referred me to the firm of Ogen & Sedaghati. That was great advice! Right off the bat Natalie took the reins of my case and never let go. She advised me during every step of the legal process. And even when it felt like the insurance company was starting to play games and be manipulative, it seemed like Natalie was always one step ahead. When it came time to negotiate with the insurance company Natalie assured me that she will not stop fighting for me! I am happy to say that Ogen & Sedaghati got me a max settlement! So if you are ever the victim of an accident, call the firm of Ogen & Sedaghati, PC and they will fight fiercely to get you what you deserve!

originalText.text: When you get hurt in an accident, whether at work or in a vehicle, it's a really tough time to balance healing, your health coverage for the medical bills, and pursue the injustice that was done to you.  Natalie, of Ogen and Sedaghati, is absolutely the best attorney I have ever experienced.  Natalie assured me that she would take care of all legal aspects and advised me throughout the process.  Most attorneys treat clients like a meat factory, but this firm treats its clients like family.  My health costs and compensation was received above my expectations because of the expertise this firm possesses.  Thank you so much, Ogen and Sedeghati for everything you have done to help me and my family throughout this ordeal.  I will recommend you to anyone that needs legal help. You truly earned the title of Super Lawyers of NYC.

originalText.text:
Ogen & Sedaghati are the best and Natalie is a pitbull  of an attorney (I mean this respectfully as I am a pitbull when it comes to business, so I appreciate this). She will fight tooth and nail to get an award that you deserve. John and Eitan are also wonderful as they are enthusiastic, responsive, and make you feel like family. All of these attorneys are extremely skilled and very proactive. Natalie constantly reassured me to relax and spend my time healing and not worrying about anything. She let me know that she had my back and that she would take care of everything. THIS WOMAN DID NOT LIE! She was efficient, honest, and quick in achieving amazing results!

Natalie was recommended to me by a friend that was represented by her in the past. I had another attorney representing me, and within hours, Natalie had proof of everything my former attorney had done wrong and gaps in efficiency. The friend that recommended me, had also recommended this firm to other friends and EVERYONE ended up with great award settlements. After my case was settled, I immediately recommended my mom, who currently is being represented by a very famous law group. She is in the process of switching over to Ogen and Sedaghati. Even in the consultation with my mom, Natalie was able to give my mom more info on her case than the attorney that has been representing her for the last 2.5 years! Go O&S! You guys rock. Surely, the best in town!
